title: Who is DJ Alok? Can anyone give me DJ Aloka? My ID is 435328406. - Quora

response.answer_text: Alok (DJ) Alok Achkar Peres Petrillo (Portuguese pronunciation: [/a'lɔki/]; born August 26, 1991) is a Brazilian DJ and record producer. He is best known for his worldwide hit song "Hear Me Now". In 2019, Alok was ranked the 11th best DJ in the world by DJ Mag. Profession: DJ, Record Producer Born: August 26, 1991, Goiânia Parents: Ekanta, Swarup Compositions: Hear Me Now
